+++ DETAILS
  
  * All plants require: 
    * 1) HorticultureLight
    * 2) ProcessHorticultureNutrients
        * Provided by:
          * HorticultureGrowMedium or 
          * dissolved in the water,mist et cetera)
    * 3) HorticultureOxygen
    * 4) HorticultureWater
    * 5) HorticultureTemperature
    * 6) HorticultureAcidity
